price: 72. Waxaa idinka mid ah mid isagu dib idiin dhiga. Hadday idinku dhacdo musiibo yidhaahda: Alle waa iigu nicmeeyay in aanaan goob joog la ahayn.
arabic: وَإِنَّ مِنكُمۡ لَمَن لَّيُبَطِّئَنَّ فَإِنۡ أَصَٰبَتۡكُم مُّصِيبَةٞ قَالَ قَدۡ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيَّ إِذۡ لَمۡ أَكُن مَّعَهُمۡ شَهِيدٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna minkum laman layubaṭṭi-anna fa-in aṣābatkum muṣībatun qāla qad anʿama al-lahu ʿalayya idh lam akun maʿahum shahīdan
